title: SAMSUNG Galaxy A52 (Awesome Black, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adaptor, Charging Cable, Sim Ejector Pin, User Manual
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Quad Rear Camera Setup: 64 MP Main Camera with OIS + 12 MP Ulra-wide + 5 MP Macro + 5 MP Depth Sensor
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 32 MP Front Camera with Selfie Focus, Smart Beauty
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty Provided by the Manufacturer from Date of Purchase

product_description.IP67 Rating: Featuring an IP67 rating, this smartphone is resistant to water and dust. It can handle being submerged at a depth of up to 1.0 meters of water for about 30 minutes.
product_description.64 MP Quad-camera Setup with OIS: This Samsung Galaxy A52 smartphone features a multi-lens camera system that helps you capture amazing shots of people and nature. With the 64 MP main camera, you can click amazing shots all through the day. For a larger viewing angle, the Ultra Wide Camera helps you capture amazing shots of the landscape and cityscape. What's more, the Depth Camera lets you customize the focus according to your needs and the Macro Camera makes it a breeze to capture detailed shots of the subjects.

review: I like the pictures it takes. Love the colors this time (I got the violet one, yay!). Finally a good processor. Display Size is good too. Value for money..

The Pros-
Beautiful, big, 90 Hz AMOLED screen
Excellent camera, OIS helps a lot
Stereo speakers sound good
IP 67 Certified , Samsung Pay and Knox security.
Heyyy, headphone jack is present


The Bad -
All around plastic
15W Charger in the box

Charging Time - 58 min (25W) , 1 Hour 45 min (15W)

Battery backup - 1.5 day with a screen on time of 6 hours
1 day with a screen on time of 10 hours 20 min.

Camera - A absolute Masterclass in it's segment with ois and 64 mp. sony sensor

Processor - Much much better than 9611 , but 750G would be great in this price. but 720G is a power efficient and balanced processor so there will be not much issues for a normal user.
The phone is pretty awesome. The camera is super cool. Using this for more than a week with no lags or heating problem. Battery life is also good for a medium user like me.

Camera and display quality is very nice. I'm impressed. Its been almost 4 months I'm using This phone. I'm getting Security updates just like android one phones. I'm not a hardcore gamer but i have played pubg several times on max graphic settings. Didn't have any issues. I didn't face any heating issues till now. Sound quality is very nice on Dolby atmos mode.
One and only thing i Don't like is it's back panel. Its very thin and low quality. Getting scratched easily. You should put a good cover other wise it will get damaged easily.
There are lots of features inside this phone like we can directly connect to windows , samsung pay etc..
I'm giving 4/5 .

I really like this phone....after use 10 days...samsung truly upgrade with this model....it's improved better than...a50 ,a50s,a51...much better than in this device....I love the back camera...front camera is good but not like back camera....front camera stragle in night...fingerprint is much better than before a series....I really love this phone....after 1 hour listening music mobile little bit hit....otherwise ok....go for it....it's value for money....

Perfect phone for all types of users.
(Review after 1 week usage)
Processor- I'm surprised to see this performance in a samsung phone.
performance is great. No lag, no heating issue for normal usage and while gaming also there is no over heating issue and no lag in high graphic settings.

Battery -
For 2-3 hours gaming, YouTube, social media and calling I'm getting upto 12 hours backup. Battery could be better.

Camera-
OIS is great, but struggles in low light conditions.
Other than that camera is awesome.
Refer some YouTube for details camera reviews
Super study mode is very good but video resolution is not good in super study mode.

Design-
Backside looks is good but camera hump is quite high and Mobile is not that much handy as compare to a50. Back panels easily get scratches so we should use a back cover.

Display-
Great display, camera hole is very small so looks great, viewing angles are good.

Speaker-
Stereo speakers are very good and supports Dolby. So we will get wonderful experience while watching films and videos.

Charging-
It will takes 1.45 hours to complete charge with in box 15w charger. Mobile supports 25w charger which is not included in the box. In 25w charger mobile charges in approx 1 hour.

Finger print-
Finger print scanner not fast as side/rear mounted. But does its job even after applying tempered glass. Tips to speedup biometric scanner- turn of unlocking animation and go to battery optimization - search com.samsong.biometric - disable battery optimization.

Phone's vibration is very weak .

Some files like Spotify offline downloads and some big files are automatically deleted. So go to battery and device care - click on 3 dots which can be seen at top right side then select storage booster here turn off auto delete unnecessary data.

Really i have no words to describe this phone . I got this phone on last Friday . First i thought samsung phone was some rumours about system hang and etc. But this phone proved mid range bumper if you are planning to buy mid range under 30k this phone gives you comfort and good camera budget under 30k.so you should buy this phone !! Camera amazing , performance 90HZ amazing , display no words for display , battery 4500MH is enough for if you are a normal user otherwise if you are a gaming person then its little bit difficult for them to battery backup but still its good optimization to handle . No heating issue , water and dust proof .
Hope you like my review

After 4 days of usage, I feel the battery backup is not that satisfactory; gets drained quickly even with light usage. The display and speaker are superb. The camera performance is also upto the mark. There are no such lags upon normal usage (thanks to the Snapdragon processor), although the device gets quite warm when put to charge. Overall it is a good purchase, would have been great if the battery was of at least 5000mAh at this price range. I would surely recommend this phone.

Amazing Phone, IP67 is big plus at this price, screen quality is amazing, 3.5mm Jack, plus the design and holding of phone is great as well.
Loved the product. Finally Samsung launched a great product in this market segment.

I loved this phone..
First time I'm using samsung mobile its Ui was simply Awsome , I was bored with MiUi, But this time One Ui interface was simply awesome So many Customizations available,
Only front camera some what disapponted...
But overall performance of phone is Too Good ..
Price is little bit High

I gifted the phone to my Dad and he absolutely loved it.
Design is somewhat similar to previous galaxy A51 but snapdargon 720G processor this time makes all the difference. It's not 5G but still a wonderful phone from Samsung. Camera is one of its strong selling point and battery is top notch for this price range.
If you a casual to moderate user then I highly recommend this phone to you.

I bought this on 10 days before.
Display- very beautiful and punchy
Camera- both cameras are excellent.
Battery backups- superb, for normal user, it will go for one and half day easily.
Speaker- stereo speakers, best in class.
Processor- power efficient and powerful enough. No lag at all.
Sound quality - just amazing.
Signal strength- great with carrier agreegation (4g+)
Ip 67 rating.
Software update- 3 years of Android + 4 years of security patch update, best deal for a mobile to get.
Though it is costlier than other mobiles by 2000 to 3000 rupees in terms of specifications but it will not disappoint you at all.
Very good camera... But a bit overpriced. You can get the same configuration with other brands under 20k. But overall very nice phone and very nice design.

This phone has many plus factors:

- Looks nice.
- Gets warm during charging but during regular use, is normal. I talk mostly on the headset.
- Great camera. Shortcuts to zoom etc while taking photos. Shoots stunning pictures and videos.
- Takes good pictures in low light as well.
- Nice enough speaker, although there are better phones with speakers if you are into hearing loud music on the speaker of the phone.

The only thing I disliked is the bloatware that comes preinstalled. Lot of apps like Dailyhunt, Primevideo etc are preloaded. Removed them all and got it as close to Android one as possible by installing Google Phone, Google Calendar, Chrome Browser etc.

All in all, a solid phone with great hardware and the price it is offered.
Really forgot to post the review for this wonderful purchase. Thanks to folks at samsung for this amazing model. I'm happy and satisfied with the purchase.

I bought this phone after reading others review only so please go visit their feedback for phone performance
Apart from those I found 2 issues(in my view they are issues)
1. I noticed some light sound near the bottom of the camera bump and the phone rim when I lightly press that area. As if the plastic back was not properly glued. This scared me on the authenticity of water resistant feature but I'm more scared to test that feature
2. After initial setup, when I was working in settings I found the phone taking some more time to search or apply /save configurations than expected(this was observed even before I installed any other apps)
Taking note that it's samsung brand A series phone and having latest snapdragon chip I was a bit disappointed in those fronts
Apart from that I'm good on other departments
